* Projects with source code are posted anonymously on the class webpage.

* Everyone has the opportunity to have your name attached to your project, if you like, after the course is over and the class grades are assigned.

* Here are the projects. In most cases, source code and data are available from [https://github.com/ionides/531w18/tree/master/final_project](https://github.com/ionides/531w18/tree/master/final_project). For computationally expensive analysis, results saved as .rda files may or may not be available.

* Some projects with confidential data are not posted.
